    • Method Detail

      • readNewUser

        public User readNewUser()
        This method create the main user. pre: The user has to enter their user name, their password and their age post: The data will be saved, their first category will be Newbie and the main user will be created.

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        This method shows the options in a menu. pre: The user has to sign in. post: The menu will be shown.

      • readOption

        public int readOption()
        This method saves the option choosen by the user. pre: The user has to enter a number between 1 and 5. post: The option will be save.

      • readUser

        public java.lang.String readUser()
        This method create the new users. pre: The user has to enter their users names, their passwords and their ages post: The data will be saved, their first category will be Newbie and the new users will be created.

      • selectPlaylist

        public int selectPlaylist()
        This method shows another menu to choose what type of playlist they want to create. pre: The user has to enter a number between 1 and 3. post: The option choosen will be saved in "select" and it will let the user interact with the type of playlist that they choose

      • readSong

        public Song readSong()
        This method saves the songÂ´s data. pre: The user has to enter the title, the artist, the date, the duration of the song and choose an option of the genre post: The data will be saved.

      • doOeration

        public void doOeration(int choice)
        This method do what the user has choosen. pre: The user has to choose an option post: It will do what the user want
        Parameters:
        choice - it is the choice of the user. 5 > choice > 1

      • startProgram

        public void startProgram()
        This method groups all the methods needed to make the program work. pre: All the preconditions for the others methods altogether. post: It saves the results of all the methods to show them in the Main.
